name: Neco-Arc Characters
description:
A Neco-Arc LORA. Thank me later👌.

You probably want to start your prompt off with this:

1girl, full body, :3, cat ears, chibi, cat girl, cat tail, solo, slit pupils

More or less of the time, it will generate the character in the default Neco-Arc pose, but if you want it to strictly commit to that pose, I've tagged the necessary images in the dataset with "necopose". So use that.

I went through too much cursed Neco art just to make a good dataset, so appreciate this or my suffering will have been for nothing.

70-something images, trained on NAI and tested across multiple models.

Trigger token may or may not be necessary, though I used it just in case. And if this shit is NSFW capable, I never wanna fucking know.

Images in preview may be from past versions! Do not expect full replication!

Images you make with this model and what you do with them are your responsibility!
